fields.name: AgentId
fields.description: (optional) The LogAnalytics agent id reporting the event that this alert is based on.

fields.name: WorkspaceId
fields.description: The LogAnalytics workspace id that stores this alert.

fields.name: WorkspaceResourceGroup
fields.description: The azure resource group for the LogAnalytics workspace storing this alert

fields.name: WorkspaceSubscriptionId
fields.description: The azure subscription id for the LogAnalytics workspace storing this alert.
